line.text: If thy soul check thee that I come so near
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Swear to thy blind soul that I was thy Will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And will thy soul knows is admitted there
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thus far for love my love-suit sweet fulfil
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Will will fulfil the treasure of thy love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ay fill it full with wills and my will one
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In things of great receipt with case we prove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Among a number one is reckoned none
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then in the number let me pass untold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Though in thy store account I one must be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For nothing hold me so it please thee hold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That nothing me a something sweet to thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Make but my name thy love and love that still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And then thou lov me for my name is Will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
